attributes.action: Have one universal exam board for all subjects.
attributes.additional_details:
I am a student studying a levels at the moment. What i have come to realise is that some schools, such as the one i go to now, do harder boards such as OCR salters as opposed to AQA . This is very unfair as it gives students unfair advantages and therefore the results can not be used as a comparison betwen schools. As well as this, there are no advantages to doing harder boards as universities do not look at the boards, so getting an A from a very hard board is the same as getting an A in a really easy board. It's just not fair.

ONE BOARD= FAIR = REFLECTS THIS COUNTRY'S TRUE EDUCATION.

All we need is one universal board so all students are studying at the same level.
